summary: A batch script builder for Morrowind, Oblivion and Skyrim (Legendary and Special Edition) as well as Fallout 3, Fallout: New Vegas and Fallout 4.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]ABOUT BETHESDASCRIPT FILE BUILDER FOR BETHESDA GAMES[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=2]
If you're looking for the precious version, check here; https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54194?

BethesdaScript is THE batch file builder for Skyrim, Oblivion, Morrowind (in the form of files you can paste into scripts with the Morrowind CK), Fallout 3, Fallout: New Vegas and Fallout 4. Supporting targeted scripts and a whole bunch else, you'll spit out a batch file capable of putting any mod to the test. This application is an extension and rebuilding of the original Torvus Reloaded that I coded a few years ago. Given the expansion of certain games, I thought it prudent to redesign the application to accommodate all of the Bethesda Softworks games that use console commands.

It will take a while to code, but I am personally aiming to have at least a working beta finished and ready for use in late March.

[/size]PLEASE DL AND ENDORSE! :) Thanx!

[i][b]THIS APPLICATION IS NOT ENDORSED, CREATED BY IS ASSOCIATED BY BETHESDA SOFTWORKS, ZENIMAX MEDIA OR ANY OF IT'S ASSOCIATES OR SUBSIDIARIES. THIS IS AN APPLICATION THAT IS DEVELOPED INDEPENDENT OF BETHESDA OR ZENIMAX. ANY QUESTIONS ABOUT THIS APPLICATION SHOULD BE POSED HERE IN THE DISCUSSION FORUM OR AT screamtherapymedia@gmail.com[/b][/i]
author: Johnathan Bane for Scream Therapy Media
